name: Ketel One Vodka Martini
preparation:
Face it: The Mad Men crew is cooler than you are. Take a step in the right direction with this classic. If you favor a vodka-based Martini, why not fill yours with a spirit boasting a rich, centuries-old legacy? The Nolet family has been distilling spirits in the Netherlands since 1691, which means Ketel One is the ideal partner for dry vermouth in a classic Vodka Martini.

Add both ingredients to a Martini glass.

Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.
